page.title: 20HOME FARM COOKSMILL GREEN
page.content: This is an{arable farm}of about 500 acres but it also has a{fattenning {unit}for 420 bulls.They are bought at 3 months and are ready for slaughter at 14 months.They are fed once a day and can eat as much as they want.Some of the barley grown on the farm is used for feeding.Other food such as potato peelings is bought.They are al- so given molasses,silage and vitamin compounds.They are kept close together and never leave their pens.Sometimes they get diseases like ringworm but as this doesn't affect the meat it is not treated.It clears up by itself in the end.Nearly all the bulls are Friesians There is a small reservoir which was made following dry summers.It was sub- sidized from public funds but now it is let to a local fishing club.It has never been used for the purpose of ir- rigating potato crops in dry weather.
